resources.string: All snaps will be marked screenshotted.
All snaps will be marked not screenshotted.

Hello, welcome to Keepchat!

Usage is easy! Make sure you have the Xposed Framework installed, then ust enable Keepchat in the Xposed Installer, reboot your phone, and then use Snapchat normally.

All Snaps you receive (both photos and video!) will be saved to your SD card under the "/keepchat" directory.

This is the free version, so senders will be told that you "screenshotted" their Snaps.

You can disable this by purchasing the full version on the Play Store.
Coded by sturmen.\nMakes use of the Xposed Framework by rovo89
